details:
Current versions of lynx have incorrect parsing of the URL. In certian
circumstances the hostname will be incorrectly derived after the '?' character.
This could lead to lynx incorrectly going to the wrong website.


For Debian 7 Wheezy, these problems have been fixed in version
2.8.8dev.12-2+deb7u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your lynx-cur packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
